Kraaken

Consulting

Comprehensive security advisory & development services for organizations of every size

Learn more

Results driven software solutions

We prioritize client-centric development, with proven experience building enterprise software solutions to help organization achieve modern security maturity standards. Our risk assessment methodology is comprehensive; taking after the STRIDE approach envisioned by Microsoft.

Security Threat and Risk Assessments

Our seasoned analysts collaborate closely with your development teams and business units to thorougly assess the potential risks your software solutions may encounter. Our focus extends beyond mere identification; we provide actionable guidance on effective risk mitigation strategies, empowering your organization to fortify its defenses against malicious threats. By partnering with us, you not only safeguard your digital assets but also enhance your resilience in an ever-evolving threat landscape.

Secure Application Development Guidance

We specialize in integrating security tools into CI/CD pipelines for enhanced software development security. Our services include assessing current processes, selecting and integrating appropriate security tools, and automating security checks throughout the pipeline. We also provide training, compliance support, and continuous improvement to ensure your organization maintains robust security while optimizing development efficiency. With our expertise, you can confidently accelerate your software delivery while mitigating security risks effectively.

Security Software Development

We offer a suite of advanced security solutions designed to address critical needs such as network visibility, data classification, and holistic vulnerability detection. Our network visibility tools offer real-time insights into network traffic, enabling proactive threat detection and response. With our data classification solutions, you can efficiently categorize and protect sensitive information, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and safeguarding against data breaches. Additionally, our holistic vulnerability detection platform operates from a centralized plane, continuously scanning your infrastructure for vulnerabilities and providing actionable insights to fortify your defenses.
